name: ChannelMediaRelayEvent
description: The event code of channel media relay.

parameters.Disconnect: 0: The user disconnects from the server due to a poor network connection.

parameters.Connected: 1: The user is connected to the server.

parameters.JoinedSourceChannel: 2: The user joins the source channel.

parameters.JoinedDestinationChannel: 3: The user joins the destination channel.

parameters.SentToDestinationChannel: 4: The SDK starts relaying the media stream to the destination channel.

parameters.ReceivedVideoPacketFromSource: 5: The server receives the audio stream from the source channel.

parameters.ReceivedAudioPacketFromSource: 6: The server receives the audio stream from the source channel.

parameters.UpdateDestinationChannelRefused: 8: The destination channel update fails due to internal reasons.

parameters.UpdateDestinationChannelNotChange: 9: The destination channel does not change, which means that the destination channel fails to be updated.

parameters.UpdateDestinationChannelIsNil: 10: The destination channel name is null.

parameters.VideoProfileUpdate: 11: The video profile is sent to the server.

parameters.PauseSendPacketToDestChannelSuccess: 12: The SDK successfully pauses relaying the media stream to destination channels.

parameters.PauseSendPacketToDestChannelFailed: 13: The SDK fails to pause relaying the media stream to destination channels.

parameters.ResumeSendPacketToDestChannelSuccess: 14: The SDK successfully resumes relaying the media stream to destination channels.

parameters.ResumeSendPacketToDestChannelFailed: 15: The SDK fails to resume relaying the media stream to destination channels.
